channel.title: game dev on Dor Ben Dor
channel.description: Recent content in game dev on Dor Ben Dor

item.title: Unity Coding Toolset
item.description: A lightweight package that encompasses small utilities, tools and code - all too small to deserve a package of their own. /* Basic styling for readability */ table { width: 90%; margin: 20px auto; border-collapse: collapse; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; } th, td { padding: 12px 15px; text-align: center; border: 1px solid #ddd; } th { background-color: #add8e6; /* Light blue color */ font-weight: bold; } tr:nth-child(even) { background-color: #f9f9f9; } .

item.title: Unity Packager
item.description: A lightweight package allowing developers to quickly create packages that are easily imported into any unity project. /* Basic styling for readability */ table { width: 90%; margin: 20px auto; border-collapse: collapse; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; } th, td { padding: 12px 15px; text-align: center; border: 1px solid #ddd; } th { background-color: #add8e6; /* Light blue color */ font-weight: bold; } tr:nth-child(even) { background-color: #f9f9f9; } .

item.title: Treasure Hunt
item.description: 1v1 multiplayer game in which each player hides his treasure, and tries to find his opponents. /* Basic styling for readability */ table { width: 90%; margin: 20px auto; border-collapse: collapse; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; } th, td { padding: 12px 15px; text-align: center; border: 1px solid #ddd; } th { background-color: #add8e6; /* Light blue color */ font-weight: bold; } tr:nth-child(even) { background-color: #f9f9f9; } .

item.title: Si'l Vous Play
item.description: Si'l Vous Play was a prototype done for the Speak French Hackathon in the French Consoulate. /* Basic styling for readability */ table { width: 90%; margin: 20px auto; border-collapse: collapse; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; } th, td { padding: 12px 15px; text-align: center; border: 1px solid #ddd; } th { background-color: #add8e6; /* Light blue color */ font-weight: bold; } tr:nth-child(even) { background-color: #f9f9f9; } .
